title: Policy Engine
description: Developed a Meta Driven framework to drive Analytics metrics, questions and Dashboards based on User Security Permissions

title: Dashboard Migration
description: Incorpated on fly migration mechanism to migrate SQL based Dashboards to NoSQL Database to make it Meta driven and provide enhanced features.

title: User Login Verification Using Face Recognition
description: Engineered a robust User Interface incorporating essential user authentication elements such as UserID and Password, further fortified with facial recognition capabilities utilizing OpenCV.

title: Battery Monitoring System using IOT
description: Conducted comprehensive analysis on Electric Vehicle battery performance, meticulously monitoring vital metrics such as voltage and current. Implemented an efficient data integration system that utilized NodeMCU and Arduino to transmit real-time battery data to Google Sheets via REST APIs.
